mapper.sql: id,in_out_typecode, biz_typecode,fees_type, subject_name, subject_code, dimen1_code, dimen1_sortno, dimen2_code, dimen2_sortno, dimen3_code, dimen3_sortno, dimen4_code, dimen4_sortno, dimen5_code, dimen5_sortno, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag,remark
mapper.select:
select
from bms_subject_info where 1=1
and del_flag='0' order by dimen1_sortno asc

select
from bms_subject_info where 1=1
and del_flag='0' limit 1

select
from bms_subject_info where 1=1
and del_flag='0'
select subject_code,subject_name from bms_subject_info where 1=1 and del_flag='0'
select from bms_subject_info where 1=1 del_flag='0' and biz_typecode = #{bizTypeCode}
mapper.insert: insert into bms_subject_info(in_out_typecode, biz_typecode,fees_type, subject_name, subject_code, dimen1_code, dimen1_sortno, dimen2_code, dimen2_sortno, dimen3_code, dimen3_sortno, dimen4_code, dimen4_sortno, dimen5_code, dimen5_sortno, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag,remark) values ( #{inOutTypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizTypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimen1Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimen1Sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimen2Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimen2Sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimen3Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimen3Sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimen4Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimen4Sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimen5Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimen5Sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select from bms_subject_info where 1=1
and del_flag='0'
